page.shortlink: ux list builder properties local css
page.description: Define custom CSS Classes that are stored at the control level.

discussion.p: By default, custom CSS classes are defined at the Component level. When controls are copied between components, CSS classes used by the control defined at the Component level are not copied.

*[ui:Local CSS]* allows you to define CSS classes at the Control level, allowing you to create a 'self-contained' List control that, when copied, includes any custom CSS classes that the List control uses.
